content:
Exciting! I'd be happy to help you with that! However, to provide you with accurate information, I'll need to know a bit more about your location and the time of year. Warbler species and their migrations vary greatly depending on the region and season.

Could you please tell me:

1. Where are you located (state/province, country)?
2. What time of year is your birding trip (month, season)?
3. Is this a spring or fall migration period for your location?

Once I have this information, I can give you a better idea of which warbler species you might expect to see during your trip to the nature reserve!
